name: Kelechi Afor
testimony: The exams on PromPay are rather straightforward, and I was rewarded for learning. The effort is worthwhile.

name: Ayomide Olagunju
testimony: PromPay is a platform where you either pass and earn, or fail and learn. Both instances are a win-win scenario.

name: Praise Okafor
testimony: This is a great way to put your knowledge to the test and get rewarded for it.

name: Sebotimo Jude
testimony: I never believed I could earn so much by answering questions online. Now, I am always on PromPay every day.
